decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( GUG/2015/798/01, GUG/2015/798/02, GUG/2015/798/03, GUG/2015/798/04, GUG/2015/798/06, GUG/2015/798/07 received on 4/12/2015. GUG/2015/798/05, GUG/2015/798/08 received on 24/02/206. GUG/2015/798/09 received on 01/03/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall be as specified within the application.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The caretakers flat hereby approved shall not be occupied at any time other than by a person solely working as a caretaker in relation to the public function hall at 61-67 Salisbury Road.
Condition : 6 - The security office hereby approved shall only be used as a security office serving the public function hall at 61-67 Salisbury Road and for no other purpose at any other time.
description: Retrospective application for the erection of a mezzanine floor to provide a security office and caretakers flat and various external alterations to the building including the removal of the existing timber railing and replacement with a (500mm higher) brick parapet wall, the insertion of windows in the rear elevation and relocation of the main front door.
